title: cmd/dist: GOARM inference fails with arm64 kernel
body: This is a selfish bug report: the fastest and most reliable 32-bit arm environment I have access to is a armhf chroot on an arm64 system and currently I'm fairly sure it falls back to GOARM=5 when running ./all.bash. I think checking assuming GOARM=7 when uname -m == armv8l would be appropriate.
